005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.util.List;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * Implements
023 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-head">fn:head</a>.
024 */
025public final class FnHead {
026  @NonNull
027  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
028      .name("head")
029      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
030      .deterministic()
031      .contextIndependent()
032      .focusIndependent()
033      .argument(IArgument.builder()
034          .name("arg")
035          .type(IItem.class)
036          .zeroOrMore()
037          .build())
038      .returnType(IItem.class)
039      .returnZeroOrOne()
040      .functionHandler(FnHead::execute)
041      .build();
042
043  private FnHead() {
044    // disable construction
045  }
046
047  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
048  @NonNull
049  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
050      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
051      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
052      IItem focus) {
053    ISequence<?> items = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
054    return ISequence.of(fnHead(items));
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Return the first item in the {@code sequence}.
059   *
060   * @param sequence
061   *          the sequence to check
062   * @return {@code IItem} first item in the sequence for a sequence {@code null}
063   *         otherwise no item is returned
064   */
065  public static IItem fnHead(List<? extends IItem> sequence) {
066    return sequence.isEmpty() ? null : sequence.get(0);
067  }
068}
